H0.text: Depletion of ground water is the major problem contributed to by overgrazing of land by livestock.

H1.text: Increased pollution is the major problem that overgrazing of land by livestock contributes to.

H2.text: Erosion of soil is the major problem contributed to by overgrazing of land by livestock.

H3.text: Acid rain is the major problem that overgrazing of land by livestock contributes to.

A4.text: Heavy grazing reduces vegetative cover and causes severe soil compaction, both of which increase erosion rates.
